content:
To normalize the provided profile, I'll follow the guidelines outlined in the task definition. Let's process the input profile step by step:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Sr. Software Eng",
  "location": "SF, California",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React.js",
    "Node.js",
    "Proj. Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc",
      "title": "Lead Software Eng",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco Bay Area"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Jr. Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Los Angeles, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalization Steps

1. **Job Title Normalization:**
   - "Sr. Software Eng" → "Senior Software Engineer"
   - "Lead Software Eng" → "Lead Software Engineer"
   - "Jr. Developer" → "Junior Developer"

2. **Location Normalization:**
   - "SF, California" → "San Francisco, California, United States"
   - "San Francisco Bay Area" → "San Francisco, California, United States"
   - "Los Angeles, CA" → "Los Angeles, California, United States"

3. **Skills Normalization:**
   - "Proj. Management" → "Project Management"
   - "React.js" → "React"
   - "Node.js" → "Node.js" (already standard)

4. **Company Name Normalization:**
   - "Tech Solutions Inc" → "Tech Solutions Inc." (standardize punctuation)

5. **Date Normalization:**
   - "March 2018" → "2018-03"
   - "June 2015" → "2015-06"
   - "February 2018" → "2018-02"

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React",
    "Node.js",
    "Project Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Lead Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Junior Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Los Angeles, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Standardized SF to full city name; Expanded engineering abbreviations; Standardized company punctuation"
}
```

This normalized profile maintains the semantic meaning of the original data while ensuring consistency and standardization across all fields.
